actions.name: Greatsword
entries: Melee atk +9 to hit, reach 5 ft., one target. 11 (2d6 + 4 damage) slashing damage plus 22 (5d8 damage) radiant damage.

actions.name: Purifying Flames {@recharge 4}
entries: Barachiel wreathes his sword in white flame, then makes a Greatsword attack. On a hit, the target takes an additional 45 (7d12 damage) fire damage plus 45 (7d12 damage) radiant damage. The target must succeed on a DC 18 Charisma saving throw or have the {@condition stunned} condition until the end of their next turn.
